title: can't post my discussion ;.;
body: why isn't it working, i spent like 40 mins on it and it won't post

replies.body:
Hey there,

This occurs when your session expires, all you have to do is copy and paste the entire body of the post you're making, refresh the page, paste it back in and hit post. Should work again.

(Make sure you're not logged out!)
wow hy did this one work
